air:Brand.Name: SEAT PLUS BAG
air:Brand.air:Title: Seat Plus Bag
SB
air:Brand.air:Text: BAG SECOND////NZC/F/CARRY ON 7KG//06I/C/CHANGE BEFOREDEPARTURE//0CC/F/CHECKED BAG FIRST//0CD/C/CHECKED

"Designed for longer trips or visits where you may need to take a little more than carry on. With seat+bag you will get:
- one carry-on bag up to 7kg - one piece of checked luggage (up to 23kgs) - a standard seat select from just NZD $5, or free for Airpoints™ Gold, Elite and Koru members - free inflight snack, tea or coffee - Airpoints Dollars™ and Status Points on every flight
• Visit Air New Zealand's Covid-19 information hub for important travel updates: https://www.airnewzealand.co.nz/covid19"
Book Flexichange for flexibility of change in travel dates without penalties, and standard seat request.

"Designed for longer trips or visits where your customer may need to take a little more than carry on. With seat+bag your customer will get:

• Visit Air New Zealand's Covid-19 information hub for important travel updates: https://www.airnewzealand.co.nz/covid19"
Seat Plus Bag
